EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2016.Waitlist Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://springoneplatform.io/]]> Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there,}}
Thank you for adding your name to the waitlist for the API-First Development workshop with Apigee and Pivotal Cloud Foundry.
We will reach out on a first-come, first served basis if seats open up.
Date: Monday, August 1st {{my.Save the Date:default=Save the Date!}} Time: 9:00am - 12:00pm PT Location: Aria Hotel <[[https://springoneplatform.io/travel]]> Room: Bristlecone 6 [Level 1]
Thanks!
